title: H2O ROCKETRY
description: It all looked so easy when you did it with paper-where valves never froze, gyros never drifted and rocked motors did not blow up in your face.Build your own rocket and bring it on the floor that blast the sky.
registration: The event comes under general registration.
rules: The team should consist of only 3 members.
Bottle for rockets must be brought by the participants.
All design materials and compressors will be provided by our team.
Rockets should be made of common water bottles.
Participants must present their rocket to organizers before their launch.
The pressure of water must be around 90 psi.
event guidelines: Participants must follow all the safety measures.
The College will not take responsibility for any damage.
